title: Kadhalenum Thervezhudhi Lyrics Kadhalar Dhinam
stanzas:
un ennam endra aettil
en ennai paarththa podhu
naanae ennai namba villai
endhan kannai nambavillai

unmai unmai unmai
unmai anbae unmael
Â unmai un vasam
endhan penmai
doli doli doli doli
doli doli doli doli (2)

indha valaikkaiyil
valaiyalgal naanallavaa
indru valaikkaiyai
valaikkindra naalallavaa(2)

sugam valaikkaiyai
valaikkayil undaanadhu
memmaelum kaivalai
valai endru aengaadho

idhu kannangalaa
illai thennangallaa
indha kannamellaam
undhan chinnangalaa

ingu naanirundhaen
verum meyyezhuththaaga
nee vandhu saerndhaai
uyir ezhuththaaga

undhan madiyinil
kidappadhu sugam sugam
indha sugaththinil
sivandhadhu mugam mugam

manam idharkena
kidandhadhu thavam thavam
aanandhamae ini ivan
uyir ponaalum

endrum oayvadhillai
indha kaadhal mazhai
kadal neelam ulla
andha kaalam varai

idhu piravigaldhorum
vidaadha bandham
pirivenum theeyil
vizhaadha sondham

doli doli doli doli
doli doli doli doli (2)
